title: G20 summit: PM Modi calls for a global AI compact to curb misuse and safeguard the future
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modis call for a global compact on artificial intelligence at the G20 Summit has recalibrated the global policy conversation around emerging technologies. As AI accelerates across sectors, from governance to warfare, PM Modi warned of high-risk misuse scenarios and urged world leaders to institutionalise guardrails that balance innovation with safety. This article breaks down what the proposal means, why it matters now, and how global cooperation could redefine the next chapter of AI governance.
content:

title: HP to cut thousands of jobs due to AI adoption
description: SAN FRANCISCO — Computer and printer maker HP announced Tuesday a sweeping restructuring plan that will eliminate about 10 percent of its workforce globally as the company pivots toward artificial intelligence to boost efficiency.

title: Opinion | A.I. Is Marketing Itself as the Anti-A.I.
description: Artificial intelligence is unpopular and uncool — so A.I. companies are making ads that don’t even bother to show their own products. Will it pay off?
content: The A.I. company Anthropic recently opened a pop-up in the West Village it designated a “Zero Slop Zone.” On offer for visitors were baseball caps with the word “thinking” on them, coffee and hard copies of a nearly 15,000-word essay by the company’s... [3633 chars]

title: AI tops density in predicting breast cancer risk
description: An image-only artificial intelligence (AI) model for predicting the five-year risk of breast cancer provided stronger and more precise risk stratification than breast density assessment, according to a study presented at the annual meeting of the Radiological Society of North America (RSNA).
content: An image-only artificial intelligence (AI) model for predicting the five-year risk of breast cancer provided stronger and more precise risk stratification than breast density assessment, according to a study presented at the annual meeting of the Rad... [4013 chars]

title: Users cheat more when AI presented as female
description: A new study says people carry their gender biases into interactions with artificial intelligence.
content:
A new study says people carry their gender biases into interactions with artificial intelligence.

title: Nvidia’s Stock Is Sinking as Doubts About Its AI Dominance Grow
description: Nvidia Corp. is facing rising concerns that its stranglehold on the market for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence computing is slipping. And that skepticism is now showing up in the stock market.
content:
Nvidia Corp. is facing rising concerns that its stranglehold on the market for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence computing is slipping. And that skepticism is now showing up in the stock market.

title: McKinsey Cuts About 200 Tech Jobs, Shifts More Roles To AI
description: McKinsey & Co. cut about 200 global tech jobs in the past week as the consulting firm joins rivals in using artificial intelligence to automate some positions. The company isn’t ruling out additional reductions across different functions over the next two years as it ramps up usage of the technology, according to people familiar with the matter. McKinsey is also closely assessing what tasks can be carried out by AI, the people said, declining to be identified as the details are private.
content:

title: AI Overview: Understanding the Basics of Artificial Intelligence
